title: Halo TV Show Teaser Reactions

transcript_chunks.text: the world premiere first look train i can't believe this is actually happening yeah after three two years of rumors after all the neil blom camp and and weta digital well they got the piano guys [Music] [Applause] [Music] we're lost in the dark but you [Music] give people hope oh [ __ ] oh [ __ ] what's the thing we were just talking about yep yeah on your review [Music] those are real pelicans boys i need to show me more i need more i need a little more a little more than that and a date like come on now let's roll this please the pelicans the universe
